sections.heading: Minor; sale or gift to; misrepresenting age; parent or guardian; duties
sections.text: No parent or guardian shall knowingly suffer or permit any minor, of whom he or she may be a parent or guardian, to violate the provisions of section 53-180.01 or 53-180.02.SourceLaws 1951, c. 174, ยง 1(4), p. 664;Laws 1961, c. 2
